title.value: Validation of ANG-1 and P-SEL as biomarkers of post-COVID-19 conditions using data from the Biobanque québécoise de la COVID-19 (BQC-19)
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: Validation of ANG-1 and P-SEL as biomarkers of post-COVID-19 conditions using data from the Biobanque québécoise de la COVID-19 (BQC-19)

extractions.description: This paper focuses on the validation of ANG-1 and P-SEL as biomarkers for post-COVID-19 conditions using data from the Biobanque québécoise de la COVID-19 (BQC-19). The study involves the analysis of the data of 249 participants leveraging clinical and proteomics data, emphasizing the importance of biobanks for reproducible research outcomes.

type.justification: The paper involves the analysis of clinical and proteomics data from 249 participants to validate biomarkers for post-COVID-19 conditions.
type.quote: We report the analysis of an observational cohort of 249 participants from the BQC19 for which proteomic data were available.

name.justification: The research focuses on the validation of clinical biomarkers using proteomic data.
name.quote: Leveraging the biobanque québécoise de la COVID-19 (BQC19) biobank, we analyzed the data of 249 participants.

name.justification: The primary aim is to validate ANG-1 and P-SEL as biomarkers for post-COVID-19 conditions.
name.quote: Validation of ANG-1 and P-SEL as biomarkers of post-COVID-19 conditions using data from the Biobanque québécoise de la COVID-19 (BQC-19)

name.justification: The dataset is explicitly mentioned and used for the analysis in the paper.
name.quote: Leveraging the biobanque québécoise de la COVID-19 (BQC19) biobank, we analyzed the data of 249 participants.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The dataset is created specifically for COVID-19 research and is not derived from any other reference paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We report the analysis of an observational cohort of 249 participants from the BQC19 for which proteomic data were available.
